Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the policy name. For example:

{ "Ref": "MyPolicy" }

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS IoT policy, such as arn:aws:iot:us-east-2:123456789012:policy/MyPolicy.
